20101208001149.500|20101208001150.750|CCO|       DEPRESSION HURTS.
20101208001150.750|20101208001152.000|CCO|       CYMBALTA CAN HELP
20101208001152.000|20101208001153.111|CCO|       WITH MANY SYMPTOMS
20101208001153.111|20101208001154.222|CCO|         OF DEPRESSION.
20101208001154.222|20101208001155.333|CCO|  TELL YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY
20101208001155.333|20101208001156.444|CCO|  IF YOUR DEPRESSION WORSENS,
20101208001156.444|20101208001157.556|CCO|    YOU HAVE UNUSUAL CHANGES
20101208001157.556|20101208001158.667|CCO|          IN BEHAVIOR
20101208001158.667|20101208001159.778|CCO|    OR THOUGHTS OF SUICIDE.
20101208001159.778|20101208001200.889|CCO|        ANTIDEPRESSANTS
20101208001200.889|20101208001202.000|CCO|       CAN INCREASE THESE
20101208001202.000|20101208001203.000|CCO|      IN CHILDREN, TEENS,
20101208001203.000|20101208001204.000|CCO|       AND YOUNG ADULTS.
20101208001204.000|20101208001205.000|CCO|    CYMBALTA IS NOT APPROVED
20101208001205.000|20101208001206.000|CCO|     FOR CHILDREN UNDER 18.
20101208001206.000|20101208001207.000|CCO|      PEOPLE TAKING MAOIS
20101208001207.000|20101208001208.000|CCO|        OR THIORIDAZINE
20101208001208.000|20101208001209.000|CCO| OR WITH UNCONTROLLED GLAUCOMA
20101208001209.000|20101208001210.000|CCO|   SHOULD NOT TAKE CYMBALTA.
20101208001210.000|20101208001211.000|CCO|           TAKING IT
20101208001211.000|20101208001212.000|CCO|   WITH NSAID PAIN RELIEVERS,
20101208001212.000|20101208001213.111|CCO|  ASPIRIN, OR BLOOD THINNERS
20101208001213.111|20101208001214.222|CCO|  MAY INCREASE BLEEDING RISK.
20101208001214.222|20101208001215.333|CCO|     SEVERE LIVER PROBLEMS,
20101208001215.333|20101208001216.444|CCO|   SOME FATAL, WERE REPORTED.
20101208001216.444|20101208001217.556|CCO|  SIGNS INCLUDE ABDOMINAL PAIN
20101208001217.556|20101208001218.667|CCO|   AND YELLOWING OF THE SKIN
20101208001218.667|20101208001219.778|CCO|            OR EYES.
20101208001219.778|20101208001220.889|CCO|     TALK WITH YOUR DOCTOR
20101208001220.889|20101208001222.000|CCO|     ABOUT YOUR MEDICINES,
20101208001222.000|20101208001223.429|CCO| INCLUDING THOSE FOR MIGRAINE,
20101208001223.429|20101208001224.857|CCO|   OR IF YOU HAVE HIGH FEVER,
